job.title: Senior Software Engineer - Golang
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Computer & Network Security
job.description: We are looking for a dedicated, hard-working Sr. Software Engineer with expertise in Golang to complement our existing engineering staff. This position can be based out of our Lake Mary, FL location, or remote. We are a group that is passionate about making the Internet a safer place by helping identify the “who” behind malicious activity. As a Software Engineer at Team Cymru, you will be at the forefront of threat intelligence and surrounded by highly experienced professionals in the field of Internet Security.The right individual will share our passion and Mission to Save and Improve Human Lives by making the Internet safer. Team Cymru is THE LEADER in Internet intelligence providing unparalleled global coverage and insight to better monitor, analyze, and predict online activity.The skills you need5+ years’ experience in enterprise software engineering5+ years’ experience with Linux1+ years’ experience with Golang1+ years’ experience writing and using automated tests1+ years’ experience as a team lead, leading 3+ other engineersExperience with Agile Software Development methodologiesExperience creating highly concurrent systemsDeep understanding of fundamental Internet conceptsAbility to work effectively with various technical and non-technical departmentsAbility to work effectively with geographically distributed teamsAbility to create and maintain SQL Database schemasAbility to assess and improve SQL Query performanceAbility to use git for version control and code maintenanceThe attitude you needPassion for Software DevelopmentNot afraid of asking questionsEnjoy learning and overcoming challenges Place high value on collaboration and team success Communication: early and oftenYour day-to-day will involveWriting codePlanning development cycles for teamDistilling concrete requirements from higher level strategic goalsGuiding and tasking the team to meet deliverablesProviding technical mentorshipTracking deliverables and coordinating with various teams and stakeholdersPerforming code reviews with the teamTechnologies you will be working withGolangCentOSPostgreSQLElasticSearchKafkaKubernetesScalaMin.ioAnsibleJenkinsAtlassian stack: JIRA, Confluence, BitbucketWhat We OfferCompetitive payMedical, Dental, Vision InsuranceSubstantial PTOCompany-matched 401(k) planThe most important benefit of working at Team Cymru is the privilege of being part of a company that works every day towards accomplishing our Mission: To Save and Improve Human Lives.This job description is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities, duties or responsibilities that are required of the employee. Duties, responsibilities and activities may change, or new ones may be assigned at any time with or without notice. Team Cymru is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to diversity and inclusion in the workplace. We prohibit discrimination and harassment of any kind based on race, color, sex, religion, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, genetic information, pregnancy, or any other protected characteristic as outlined by federal, state, or local laws.
